page.title: 11Things to do.
page.content:
There are lots of things to do in the village.{For young people}there are Cubs, Scouts, Brownies and Guides. A youth club meets once a week for those over ten years old where you can play darts, snooker, table tennis and space invaders. You can buy from a tuck-shop and bring tapes to play on a stereo. {Other things to do are : Women's Institute. Aerobics. British Legion. Whist Drives. Darby and Joan Club. Painting Club. Pre-school Playgroup. Bingo. Mother/toddler Group Keep-fit Club. Country Dancing. Gardening Club. Carnival Group. Tap Dancing. Civil Service Retirement Association.
{Emily Ruth Goodey. {Caroline Michelle Dickson.
